title: Login not working
description: User reports being unable to log in using correct credentials.

title: Invoice not generated
description: Monthly invoice failed to generate for customer.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: Notifications take up to 30 minutes to send.

title: API rate limit issues
description: Client receiving rate limit errors below threshold.

title: Dashboard loading slowly
description: Dashboard takes over 20 seconds to load after login.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Customer unable to receive password reset instructions.

title: Data sync failure
description: CRM data not syncing across devices.

title: Subscription upgrade not reflecting
description: Customer upgraded plan but still sees old limits.

title: Mobile app crashes
description: App crashes on launch for Android version 15.

title: Incorrect report totals
description: Sales report shows inconsistent totals compared to database.
